English.Char_Desc_45: Keep all your documents and data in one place
English.Char_Desc_80: Keep all your documents in one place while you are on the move with this app...
English.Char_Desc_250: SSuite My Personal Briefcase is a management tool which helps you keep all important data in one single place. It supports all general files and documents e.g. RTF, DOC(X), XLS, CSV, BMP, JPG and GIF files.
English.Char_Desc_450: SSuite My Personal Briefcase is a management tool which helps you keep all important data in one single place. It supports all general files and documents e.g. RTF, DOC(X), XLS, CSV, BMP, JPG and GIF files. You can drop the program files to any location on the hard disk and double-click the executable in order to run it. Aside from that, you can place them on a portable storage unit, and use it on any computer you can connect to.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
SSuite My Personal Briefcase is a management tool which helps you keep all important data in one single place. It supports all general files and documents e.g. RTF, DOC(X), XLS, CSV, BMP, JPG and GIF files.
You can drop the program files to any location on the hard disk and double-click the executable in order to run it. Aside from that, you can place them on a portable storage unit, and use it on any computer you can connect to.
All uploaded documents can be seen in the main window as a list, along with details such as name, last accessed date and time, size and status. There is also a simple search function you can use, or you can export files to a custom output directory. From the settings panel you can choose to delete original documents on import and open them on double-click.
SSuite My Personal Briefcase is a tiny, yet useful piece of software, especially for people who find themselves on the move often enough.
